description: The Taliban strip the country’s women of everything, even their femininity.

title: What The Board Needs To Know
description: Everything from the week beginning July 10, 2023, that a corporate board director needs to know ahead of a board meeting. This week we ask whether organizations could benefit from combining the chief information officer and chief information security officer role. Also, large-scale hardware replacement for a Canadian cybersecurity attack victim, and a slight decrease in cyber insurance pricing.
